mapper.select: SELECT tjt.id AS id, (SELECT tu.username FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS username, (SELECT tu.real_name FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS realName, (SELECT tr.name FROM t_role tr WHERE tr.id = (SELECT tu.rid FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS role, (SELECT td.name FROM t_department td WHERE td.id = (SELECT tu.did FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS department, (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AS year, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 1 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month1, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 2 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month2, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 3 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month3, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 4 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month4, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 5 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month5, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 6 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month6, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 7 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month7, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 8 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month8, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 9 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month9, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 10 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month10, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 11 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month11, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 12 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month12, (SELECT tp.summary_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS summaryScore, (SELECT tar.total_score FROM t_ability_result tar WHERE tar.year =(SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tar.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS abilityScore, (SELECT tp.year_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS yearScore -- (SELECT ttp.test_type_id FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id)AS testType FROM t_join_test tjt WHERE (SELECT ttp.test_type_id FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) = 2

SELECT tjt.id AS id, (SELECT tu.username FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS username, (SELECT tu.real_name FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS realName, (SELECT tr.name FROM t_role tr WHERE tr.id = (SELECT tu.rid FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS role, (SELECT td.name FROM t_department td WHERE td.id = (SELECT tu.did FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS department, (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AS year, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 1 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month1, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 2 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month2, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 3 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month3, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 4 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month4, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 5 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month5, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 6 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month6, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 7 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month7, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 8 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month8, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 9 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month9, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 10 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month10, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 11 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month11, (SELECT twp.month_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.month = 12 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month12, (SELECT tp.summary_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS summaryScore, (SELECT tar.total_score FROM t_ability_result tar WHERE tar.year =(SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tar.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS abilityScore, (SELECT tp.year_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS yearScore FROM t_join_test tjt WHERE (SELECT ttp.test_type_id FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) = 2 AND (SELECT tu.did FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid) = #{did}

ttp.test_type_id FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) = 2 AND tjt.uid = #{uid}

SELECT tjt.id AS id, (SELECT tu.username FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS username, (SELECT tu.real_name FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS realName, (SELECT tr.name FROM t_role tr WHERE tr.id = (SELECT tu.rid FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS role, (SELECT td.name FROM t_department td WHERE td.id = (SELECT tu.did FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS department, (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AS year, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 1 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month1, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 2 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month2, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 3 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month3, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 4 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month4, (SELECT tp.summary_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS summaryScore, (SELECT tar.total_score FROM t_ability_result tar WHERE tar.year =(SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tar.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS abilityScore, (SELECT tp.year_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS yearScore FROM t_join_test tjt WHERE (SELECT ttp.test_type_id FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) = 1

SELECT tjt.id AS id, (SELECT tu.username FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS username, (SELECT tu.real_name FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS realName, (SELECT tr.name FROM t_role tr WHERE tr.id = (SELECT tu.rid FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS role, (SELECT td.name FROM t_department td WHERE td.id = (SELECT tu.did FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS department, (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AS year, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 1 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month1, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 2 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month2, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 3 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month3, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 4 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month4, (SELECT tp.summary_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS summaryScore, (SELECT tar.total_score FROM t_ability_result tar WHERE tar.year =(SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tar.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS abilityScore, (SELECT tp.year_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS yearScore FROM t_join_test tjt WHERE (SELECT ttp.test_type_id FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) = 1 AND (SELECT tu.did FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid) = #{did}

SELECT tjt.id AS id, (SELECT tu.username FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS username, (SELECT tu.real_name FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)AS realName, (SELECT tr.name FROM t_role tr WHERE tr.id = (SELECT tu.rid FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS role, (SELECT td.name FROM t_department td WHERE td.id = (SELECT tu.did FROM t_user tu WHERE tu.id = tjt.uid)) AS department, (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AS year, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 1 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month1, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 2 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month2, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 3 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month3, (SELECT twp.queater_score FROM t_work_plan twp WHERE twp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND twp.queater = 4 AND twp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS month4, (SELECT tp.summary_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS summaryScore, (SELECT tar.total_score FROM t_ability_result tar WHERE tar.year =(SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tar.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS abilityScore, (SELECT tp.year_score FROM t_performance tp WHERE tp.year = (SELECT ttp.year FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) AND tp.be_check_id = tjt.uid)AS yearScore FROM t_join_test tjt WHERE (SELECT ttp.test_type_id FROM t_test_plan ttp WHERE ttp.id = tjt.test_id) = 1 AND tjt.uid = #{uid}
